desc: Unleash the power of your new iPhone 4S or other iOS 5-driven iPhone and take it to the limit using powerful tips and techniques from the Apple experts at TUAW, Erica Sadun, Steve Sande, and Michael Grothaus. Fast and fun to read,
title: Taking Your iPhone 4S to the Max: For iPhone 4S and Other iOS 5-Enabled iPhones (Technology in Action)
